headline: Is Palo Alto Networks (PANW) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Palo Alto Networks is fairly priced or offering value right now, the starting point is to look closely at how its current share price stacks up against a few key valuation checks. The stock most recently closed at US$179.37, with returns of a 4% decline over the last 7 days, a 9.8% decline over the last 30 days, flat year to date at 0.0%, a 0.1% decline over 1 year, 165.6% over 3 years and 195.0% over 5 years. This gives you a mixed picture of shorter term...
